results.title: [Hu Shuo's amazing travels]
results.brief_description: Computer animated story about the humble Hu Shuo’s perilous journey through Middle Kingdom in search of the ever-present nature of Da Miao (Miao Miao the Necromancer) and his subsequent encounters with the Fu Bears.

results.title: Start to Read
results.creator_credit: Tony Wise, Jacky Moini, Video Collection and Thames Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Learn with Sooty”.
This video explains the importance of knowing how to read, with many examples and exercises which show this to be true. The video will help young children learn at their own individual pace in a way that is both meaningful and enjoyable.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tony Wise, Jacky Moini, Video Collection and Thames Television
results.description:

results.title: The Survivor
results.brief_description: Using animation and archival live action footage (sourced from the Prelinger Archive) this is a story of a lonely astronaut’s survival as he watches the global destruction of Planet Earth from afar.

results.title: Stan
results.brief_description: This 3D computer animated tragedy tells the story in verse of a mad scientist who creates a human boy. A rework of the classic Frankenstein story, this black fairytale adds a new element to the tale.

results.title: Patito
results.brief_description: Follow one little lost duck’s adventurous journey as he conquers all manner of objects and obstructions to finally rejoin his family. Animated non-narrated story with music composition and production by Miguel Rios.
